mapper.select: SELECT U.EMP_NUM , U.USER_ID , U.PASSWORD , U.USER_NAME , U.ORG_ID , O.ORG_NAME , U.ROLE_CODE , U.PASSWORD_CHANGE_DATE FROM USER U LEFT OUTER JOIN ORGANIZATION O ON U.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID WHERE U.USER_ID = #{userId} AND U.IS_EMPLOYED = 'Y' AND U.PASSWORD_RESET_REQ != 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET PASSWORD_RESET_REQ = 'Y' WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
